name: set_float_shoe
description: If true, puts whether this <%=doc_class_name%> has the effects of `FloatShoe`.
Otherwise, removes the effect of `FloatShoe` if the <%=doc_class_name%> has it.
While under the effects of `FloatShoe`, the <%=doc_class_name%> does **not** get affected by negative <%=tile%> affects.

parameters.name: has_effect
parameters.desc: `true` if you want this <%=doc_class_name%> to have the `FloatShoe` effect. Otherwise `false`.
